function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Uncertain government policy measures","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"New variant of covid-19 driving increased transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing measures in virtual programs for smes","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of financial support for entrepreneurship programs","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 outbreak causing factory shutdowns and reduced production","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Supply chain vulnerability due to reliance on suppliers from countries with more covid-19 cases","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Behavioral changes due to the covid-19 crisis affecting entrepreneurship","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of supportive infrastructure for entrepreneurship universities, science parks, incubators","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate empirical research on the impact of policy responses on sme resilience and entrepreneurial capacity","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Financial vulnerability of small businesses","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of support for small business resilience","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependency on a single supplier increases the risk of disruption in the supply chain, potentially impacting production and operations.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited resources and financial constraints create challenges in implementing resilient practices within smes, especially during a crisis.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resilience of smes is interconnected with the resilience of their ecosystems, making them dependent on external factors.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of entrepreneurial orientation in firms","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of resilience in the entrepreneurial ecosystem","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges posed by the health crisis","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heightened focus on resilience","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Desire for autonomy, wealth, power, status, and personal achievement in entrepreneurship","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pivoting business operations to selling face masks may lead to increased physical interaction and potential spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of resilience and crisis management at the micro and macro levels may result in prolonged business closures and economic instability.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited management-level skill or qualification","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Changed consumer behavior","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High uncertainty level due to the ongoing crisis","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Behavioral changes due to the crisis","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disruption of supply chains in the manufacturing industry due to workplace closures and reduced production","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption and closure of businesses in the sports, travel, tourism, and hospitality industries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Job reductions in the travel and tourism industry due to global travel bans","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of sars-cov-2 and covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of the virus due to economic instability and behavioral changes leading to cultural and lifestyle changes","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hardships faced by smes in sectors with high public interaction","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for resilience and adaptability in entrepreneurship amidst the crisis","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Substantial spread of sars-cov-2 from patients to health-care workers due to ineffective personal protective equipment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unknown effectiveness of portable air filters in clearing sars-cov-2 in real-world ward settings.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Presence of sars-cov-2 particles in the air of hospital wards","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Presence of other pathogens in the air of hospital wards","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Data uncertainties leading to inaccurate transmission models","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate prioritization of investigations and surveillance activities","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient understanding of movement dynamics and demographics","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in risk predictions due to limited training data and unknown spatial differences in treatment seeking rates.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of information on receptivity to imported cases due to outdated prevalence data and changes in population dynamics.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of travel histories in case data raising the possibility of infections acquired away from the location of residence.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertain representation of population in cdrs","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Uncertain accuracy of risk mapping approach","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of cross-border movement rate quantification","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of post-elimination surveillance targeting","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Rising parasite carriage by human travellers","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Difficulty in quantifying and understanding human movement patterns","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Influence of human mobility on the spatial impact of interventions","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Heterogeneous pattern of impact targeting surveillance and control","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"}]}
